INFO.TITLE: This great continent is the cradle of humanity, culture, and wildlife.
INFO.DESCRIPTION: It has spawned millions of species, from tiny frogs to gorillas and the largest mammals on the planet. Africa is also the birthplace of Abercrombie & Kent, pioneers in luxury safaris since 1962.
INFO.PACKAGE2: The Great Migration Safari in Style
